topic.title: Zeronet and China
topic.body:
Why is a lot of traffic coming from China?

I know that it helps censorship and all but how did it get big there?

I heard that a blogger spread the news about Zeronet

topic.title: Divided forum sections?
topic.body: Like reddit's subreddits, can we have divided forum sections to talk about specific stuff instead of different topics being spewed on one big timeline?

topic.title: Cool new website
topic.body:
Found this on reddit, http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KZHpiagtp9yhxJneTfkdrzVMzmpv4b6RE

Its called AESimple and it can encrypt files up to 1 mb.

topic.title: Group chat for Zeronet
topic.body:
https://darkwire.io/NJu66W9Pb

/nick <nickname>

Type it twice to change your nickname

Talk about anything

2_1J7dTw3ZsXUsXzpBqVWVj5aXRUMsMC6Nfc.body:
Telegram uses its own cryptography. 

The #1 rule of cryptography is to never role out your own crypto.

This is why Signal beats Telegram. It use standard encryption.
Whatsapp uses Signal's protocol for making communication better than Telegram.

Thus Whatsapp beats Telegram.

2_1LfQ8dwqkqkGQNCg1kBevHPxjvTRJTQYBz.body:

I'm sorry if I was ignoring you, but I can't translate Chinese.

1_1CoVAt2jBzV4Na6nX3VG1JSfjS8fwse1Z9.body: Check out Play, it hosted on Zeronet

> [cannonfodder](#comment_21_1GCMDNMgJHvZJfdbD9ygDmpBdnVAobdJYg): I've been running tvepisodes.bit for listings of TV torrents/magnets. I also insert many of the TV episodes into Freenet and provide the keys for fully decentralized and anonymous file downloads. Unfortunately I sourced from kat.cr so I'm looking for a new source now. It shows the concept of a ZeroNet hosted site is workable for magnets.

Pirates Bay is a good close 2nd.

1_1CUWvSDzwpptqETaZnrL7EqwqeThd5WuSr.body: Theres already them, Play and ZeroTorrent

3_1CoVAt2jBzV4Na6nX3VG1JSfjS8fwse1Z9.body:
People that are being censored in restricted areas, have no chance to talk about politics. 

Zeronet shows up as a way to express uncensored content about anything, but you say lets censor this particular subject?

z3r0c00l, your missing the point of Zeronet, its to express your opinions without someone covering your mouth or watching what you say. 

Think about the Arab Spring, people used Tor and Facebook to communicate with each other and talk about the corruption of their governments. This led to a revolution that will go down in history books. Would you tell them to censor themselves of these "politics" and keep Tor and/or Facebook away from that subject matter?

> [z3r0c00l](#comment_8_1CoVAt2jBzV4Na6nX3VG1JSfjS8fwse1Z9): Besides, i didn't say that users who discuss politics should be permanently banned, i simply suggested that they use their own judgment and refrain from starting political debates and focus instead on more positive things that will improve this community.

You come to a censorship free network to talk about censoring subjects that don't appeal to you. How did you think people would have reacted?

> [z3r0c00l](#comment_10_1CoVAt2jBzV4Na6nX3VG1JSfjS8fwse1Z9): And they can still do that over tor and post thier hate or othervise political speech on facebook reddit/twitter and any other platform... I login here expecting and the first thing that pops up is "allah akbar" and "kill the cops"... Is that the kind of place you want zeronet to be? Really?gmab

Hate speech is free speech deal with it. Your feelings don't have human rights. The person that coined the term "hate speech" was Stalin, and it was a tool to imprison citizens that talked against the USSR. 

Hate speech can be considered anything: from a few points of criticism, to talking harshly about your government, to saying a threat.

Someone could call this post hate speech for trying to censor, but you don't see your post being taken down.

Zeronet is a network, Zerotalk is a forum. Two different things. Whats wrong about people talking about their governments and politics? That doesn't limit what you can say.

Your feelings don't have rights, your speech does, thats why we keep shitposts like these here.

> [z3r0c00l](#comment_11_1CoVAt2jBzV4Na6nX3VG1JSfjS8fwse1Z9): You do realize that users can still be banned on ZeroNet? So much about your "I'll do and say what i want" Like i said -There is no such thing as absolutely free speech... "Allow the site owner to modify banned users file" is the script they are working on right now, so i guess your "rights" are under attack as we speak...

Where did you find the quote from? From what it is now, there are no banning user files.

> [z3r0c00l](#comment_13_1CoVAt2jBzV4Na6nX3VG1JSfjS8fwse1Z9): Funny.. Isn't that how democracy works? Or are you saying that democracy doesn't work and what works best is an anarchy?I think that community should have a chance to vote on what kind of content they want to see here, and i am pretty sure that hate speech terrorists and pedophiles will not be on the list after the votes have been counted... Now that's a free speech free from oppression. The will of the people - the true democracy.

This guy talked nothing about democracy.

This forum is freedom of speech. That doesn't mean you can't create your own and control what everyone have to say. (There won't be many people on that forum because no one like a gag over their mouth.)

A terrorist can be classified as anything. It could be someone that makes a national threat online or a person that wants to speak their mind.  

By not giving someone a platform, we are unable to see both sides of a story. Even if whatever the person says is 100% wrong, as humans we can dispute this with our own morals.  What your calling for is a one sided story, and has history has shown, this leads to bad stuff.

Let this linger before you speak, Galileo was trying to be censored by the Church for his research, because they didn't like what he was proving. If Galileo had been censored completely, we would have had been hundreds of years behind on technological advancement.

Your asking for is limiting intellectual freedom.

> [z3r0c00l](#comment_16_1CoVAt2jBzV4Na6nX3VG1JSfjS8fwse1Z9): Well since you're so vocal on this subject, one would assume that you already have all the facts... Do your own research, and if you don't find anything let me know I'll post the link...

I'm vocal about this, because you came to the wrong forum to talk about censorship. And you use hate speech as a tactic to censor this forum, when you have no idea what it is.

The funny thing is, you claim we should censor this forum because of terrorism and hate speech, when you just want to censor politics. Kind of shows how corrupted people twists words around to fulfill their agendas.

Post the link.

> [z3r0c00l](#comment_20_1CoVAt2jBzV4Na6nX3VG1JSfjS8fwse1Z9): Good point.. Thanks.

Wow, so you wanted to censor this whole forum because your feelings and emotions were being hurt by some posts. 

Your feelings don't have rights.

2_1AZjDLkfYwSmjM7ZJUf7HHnrF778augRMa.body:
>IÂ´m worried about the security of this net, it will end up like TOR? full of exploits/malware, psychopaths, drugdealers ,pedophiles and many other kind of criminals? 

Stop reading articles from the internet talking about how Tor is only used by bad people, because it certainly isn't. You how I know you didn't do any research on Tor and just read media's biased opinions about the spooky "Dark Web?"

From TheTorProject's website: 
Note: even though it originally came from an acronym, Tor is not spelled "TOR". Only the first letter is capitalized. In fact, we can usually spot people who haven't read any of our website (and have instead learned everything they know about Tor from news articles) by the fact that they spell it wrong. 

Source: https://www.torproject.org/docs/faq#WhyCalledTor
